descriptionHtml:
BLESSINGS - Devout Rewards

A Blessing overhaul.

This mod enhances the Divines Blessing system by increasing the strength and duration of bonuses, and adding new bonuses if you continue to use the same Divine for your blessings.

Example:
Talos's blessing will give a bonus of -10% shout recovery time, lasting for 12 hours, when the blessing expires return to a Shrine of Talos and still only receive a bonus of -10% shout recovery time. But then! ..return a third time and his blessing will have increased to -12%, then -14%, and so on. After a few more bonus increases, the blessing will become -20% shout recovery AND +10% one-handed damage lasting for a day, then -22% shout recovery AND +12% one-handed damage, and so on. His 'ultimate' blessing for the truly devout follower will bestow -30% shout recovery time, +20% one-handed damage AND +15% critical hit chance lasting for 7 WHOLE DAYS!!

Affected blessings are: Akatosh, Arkay, Dibella, Julianos, Kynareth, Mara, Nocturnal, Stendarr, Talos and Zenithar.

For you to prove your faith, the blessings must be allowed to run their course. Spamming the shrines will result in your 'faith' decreasing. I have allowed a small grace period allowing you to renew the blessings if around an hour or so is left before the last blessing expires. ALSO! using the shrine of another Divine will reset your faith with the previous one!!

Disclaimer:
I have tested this mod to the best of my (patience) abilities and everything looks perfect, but I am releasing it as a BETA version just in case anybody finds flaws in the mod - FEEDBACK WOULD BE GREAT!! (please)

Conflicts:
Anything that modifies the Divine Blessings!!

Installation:
Extract, place in data folder, blah blah.
Or use Nexus Mod Manager!!!!

Uninstallation:
Not recommended, papyrus might cry :(
Or use Nexus Mod Manager!!!! (papyrus may still cry)

A detailed spreadsheet with all the blessings and bonus %'s is included in the 7z file.

Changelog v1.1

- Shuffled a few blessing effects around to be a little more lore friendly (Thanx to Cliven for some good thinking).

- Kynareth's final blessing now grants a spell that gives a short burst of speed and allows the player to walk on water.

- Players will now be given a message when their blessing is due to expire in one hour (at this point players can have their blessings renewed without the 'reduced faith spam effect')
